psdanalyser.psd_analyser module¶

HR 08/02/22 Particle size distribution (PSD) analyser To: (1) Parse Mastersizer-derived spreadsheet and extract PSD data,

  1. Fit PSD data to log-normal distribution, and

  2. Apply product difference algorithm to PSD data to give n-component distribution with same moments

References in methods

psdanalyser.psd_analyser.lognormal_CDF(x, M, S, called_by='') → int¶

Calculate value of lognormal CDF at x with lognormal parameters M, S

Parameters:

  • x (float) – Particle size (microns)

  • M (float) – First lognormal parameter (dimensionless)

  • S (float) – Second lognormal parameter (dimensionless)

  • called_by (str) – Name of function/method calling this method

Returns:

CDF – Value of lognormal cumulative distribution function at (x, M, S)

Return type:

float

psdanalyser.psd_analyser.lognormal_PDF(x, M, S)¶

Calculate value of (normalised) lognormal PDF at x with lognormal parameters M, S

Parameters:

  • x (float) – Particle size (microns)

  • M (float) – First lognormal parameter (dimensionless)

  • S (float) – Second lognormal parameter (dimensionless)

  • called_by (str) – Name of function/method calling this method

Returns:

PDF – Value of lognormal probability density function at (x, M, S)

Return type:

float
